website_summaries.verdict: The capable, compact, and attractive Acer Aspire AXC-605-UR11 isn't the only budget desktop PC out there, but it  is one of the most affordable.
pros: Attractive front panel dresses up basic construction
cons: Limited room for upgrades and expansion

customer_reviews.title: Great workspace PC! Be aware of the dual display requirements.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine! I bought 5 of these for our data entry team. There is no wireless, and expandability would be a challenge if you're looking to add internal hardware. The only challenge I had with these PCs is that they do support dual displays, but one is your standard VGA port and the second is HDMI. I had to pickup HDMI to DVI cables to work with some of our non-HDMI displays. There is a bit of Pre-Installed Acer software that I removed unclutter the desktop, apps, and processes. Love the smaller foot print. Front powered USB and High Speed ports are nice. Keyboard and Mouse are corded. No thrills there.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great little PC
customer_reviews.text: I've had this PC for 4 months now and I love it. I paid about $150 less than what it's selling for now (not sure why the increas in price), but even at this price I would still highly recommend it. The speed when surfing the web is excellent, and set-up was very easy. If you're going to buy an Acer, stick to the ones with this type of processor and graphics card.
customer_reviews.author: William Tell

customer_reviews.title: Easy with the Windows 10 update!
customer_reviews.text: It works fine as does the monitor that I bought from Acer. Windows 8 was terrible and the designer should be demoted to Commodore 64 status. The directions could have been a tad better. I am not a geek who does computer set ups everyday.....nor am I brainless either. It works and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer for home or office use, windows 8 can take some time to learn, but the computer will do anything you need from email and internet browsing , uploading pictures, the memory card reader is a great addition. The computer starts incredibly fast and runs multiple applications smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandparents. I've had nothing but issues with it. The disk usage is maxed at 100% almost always. Apps are crashing endlessly. I didn't expect a lot from a cheap computer but this is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Pro

customer_reviews.title: for the price ok, any problems were more windows ...
customer_reviews.text: for the price ok, any problems were more windows 8 fault then computer, once upgraded to windows 10 works much better
customer_reviews.author: wde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This Acer desktop works great. Fast loading. Still learning to navigate the version 8.1, coming from v7, subtle changes. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little PC for the little tasks. Easy setup and ease of use right out of the box. I paid much less and use it as my media XBMC PC. It sits in the back and does its thing. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Scottia

customer_reviews.title: Acer Computer
customer_reviews.text: Good machine. Too much bloat wear and had to add RAM, but now works well. Would have preferred Windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: Eytan

customer_reviews.title: Great value; upgradeable free to Win 10
customer_reviews.text: Great value; and was able to upgrade free to Win 10
customer_reviews.author: Isolingua

customer_reviews.title: windows 8 is terrible, stay with 7 as long as you
customer_reviews.text: computer is ok , windows 8 is terrible , stay with 7 as long as you can
customer_reviews.author: Good Cook

customer_reviews.title: Acer Desktop
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the computer for a couple of weeks. So far I haven't run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: HAS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far I have been very pleased seems to be a good product
customer_reviews.author: harold hefner

customer_reviews.title: Small Machine, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer almost a year ago, and it's worked great, hasn't been a single error. After upgrading to Windows 10, adding a GT 740, 8gb ram, and replacing the power supply, this computer is great for gaming and rendering. I got the computer when it was around $300, not sure why the price increased after it was released though. If you have a time machine, go back a year or so and buy this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to anyone unless you like to see your ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is complete trash. I have had it for a month now and today it crashed for the third time. All of my files were wiped and I had to reinstall everything again. I would not recommend this to anyone unless you like to see your screen suddenly turn black and crash in an instant. Although it has an core i5 processor, this computer is slow and lags when playing videos. Save yourself some trouble and don't buy this piece of trash. (Certain that Acer wrote own reviews to boost ratings. Don't be tricked!)
customer_reviews.author: Xin Li

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire AXC-605-UR11 Desktop (Black)
product_meta.description:
Acer Aspire AXC-605-UR11 Desktop PC comes with these specs: 4th Generation Intel Core i3-4130 Processor, Windows 8.1, 4GB DDR3 Memory, Intel HD Graphics, 16X DVDR/RW SuperMulti Drive, 500GB 7200RPM SATA Hard Drive, Digital Media Card Reader -Secure Digital (SD) Card, High Definition Audio with 5.1-Channel Audio Support, 4 - USB 2.0 Ports, 2 - USB 3.0 Port, HDMI, Gigabit Ethernet, Keyboard and Mouse, 15.34 lbs. | 6.96 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support, Registration/ Limited Warranty Card, McAfee Internet Security Suite Trial.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Intel Core i3-4130 3.4 GHz Processor (3 MB cache)
